I mean I love the TV and everything but those green flashes bother the heck out of me when watching a movie.UPDATE!!!!!if you turn the auto motion to smooth so the picture does not look "shakey" when watching movies, if you turn the auto motion plus to smooth you will see the green lines but if you leave it at standard then you won't see them, this is an issue and Samsung needs to come out with an update. try it out on your TV if you have this model.

Reviews.Title: Beware of the power supply boards
Reviews.Author: Serge Kavetsky "Mr. Fix-it"
Reviews.Content: The Achilles heal of LCD series of this television was the power supply board.  It only lasted for one-two years before it would have to be replaced.  Replacement boards are now hard to find, because this was such a big problem.  Samsung chose to look the other way in the hops that people would just buy a newer model. Hopefully the LED sets have a different power board.

Reviews.Title: after one year of service
Reviews.Author: eman
Reviews.Content: This HDTV was received on Schedule and installed by the delivery people.  They made sure it was up and running.Overall I score this TV a 4 with a stunning picture.  There are some things that could be improved like anything.  The most bothersome thing is the lack of a unified remote control and the means to access the apps via the remote. Secondly the installation of the wireless adapter was easier on the BD5500 Blue Ray player that was part of the bundle than it was on the TV so I've left it configured that way.Setting the audio and video controls was easy.  The black levels are a bit trickier.Service wise I've experienced the sudden loss of picture & sound and will be scheduling warranty service to correct that issue.

Reviews.Title: Poor Panel
Reviews.Author: Foxxy meow
Reviews.Content: I bought mine last  March 22, 2011. It was great at first as it was my first led tv.Came june 9, 2011. I started seeing vertical thin lines while watching on it. It made a flickering thin lines in the middle of the tv while i was on netflix. I tried on cable and xbox -- the thin lines were still there. So i called samsung, and they were pretty helpfulmand set me up with a tv tech right away who came in my house within 2 days. The tv tech told me its a bad panel, so he had to take it apart and replace it with a new one. If u buy this tv, make sure u purchase a extended warranty coz it is beautiful indeed but i yjinkniy doesnt have the greatest panel/led out there. Next purchase would definitely Toshiba. Pricier but is definitely more quality.aLso, i wasnt even abusing the tv, i would make sure its turned off after 7 or 8 hrs after using it.So  buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Don't second guess -- BUY IT
Reviews.Author: Eric Kimler
Reviews.Content: The screen is super thin, the speakers aren't home theater but have a good range in tone and are loud enough. I spent several hours a day looking at different TV's for over a month and I always came back to this one. I am glad I did. Best purchase I've ever made.

Reviews.Title: Really good TV.  Needs picture adjustments out of the box
Reviews.Author: James M
Reviews.Content: I was about to write a mildly negative review of this tv, since I wasn't pleased with the picture quality.  And no amount of fiddling with settings seemed to help.  But I did find that someone wrote their review below and included their recommended picture settings.  This completely solved my issue and now I can't be happier with it.  Just be aware that out of the box, the settings are almost all set to the max (backlight, brightness, etc.).  The changes don't take more than a couple minutes.  Take the time to look at the recommended picture settings in the reviews here and you'll be very pleased you did.  I agree with some of the other reviews that audio is ok, but not fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with Samsung
Reviews.Author: evanmiller67
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after being robbed. I had a Samsung 46" LCD before, so I figured I'd upgrade to the LED. It was delivered via freight, so you have to take some time for that (kudos to the freight company--I called to let them know I was tight on time and they were there immediately). Overall, I am very pleased with the TV.Pros:*Bright, deep and rich color*Internet apps.  I haven't played with this a whole lot, but through one of the pre-installed was able to get a free movie rental.  1080p streaming over the internet.  Awesome.*Multitudes of configuration options.  You can get lost in all the menu options.  This is great if you're the person that likes to tinker and customize.  I haven't changed the default settings on mine a whole lot, just haven't had the time.*Ease of installation.  I was at home by myself when it was delivered.  Within half an hour I had it setup and workingCons:*Speaker quality.  Don't expect a whole lot from the stock speaker system.  It's only 1.1" thick, so getting a speaker that will sound great in there just won't happen. Get yourself a sound bar or a surround sound system.*Some scenes can get choppy. Because of the 120 Hz or the processing going on, when someone moves their head you sometimes get a few choppy frames.  Maybe this is my TV service, but it sticks out.Other thoughts:*Out of the box settings look like every HD channel is a soap opera.  I know this can be changed through the settings, but after watching it a while, you get used to it and definitely makes for a clearer, sharper, crisper picture.*I could do without the clear bevel. Not sure what purpose it serves.*Not a huge fan of the stand.Overall, I love Samsung TVs and would purchase another one.  Super quality, great price, fantastic options.

Reviews.Title: Love our Samsung LED TV !!!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Markiewicz
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV after seeing it at Sam's, when they were out of stock I dedided to check Amazon and found a comparable price/better model. I have ordered several smaller items from Amazon and have always been pleased, but was a bit skeptical about ordering such a large item, especially an LED TV.  I was very pleased with the whole process.  When I ordered the TV I didnt realize there was a special that if ordered by March a free LAN Adapter (to connect to internet) would be provided.  Right away I contacted Amazon via chat and their customer svc rep, Makesh, told me that although the order was being processed and LAN cpuld not be added, he could promo the entire cost of LAN after I ordered it, which he did......love Amazon's customer service, it has always been very good....Now about the TV, it arrived undamaged, it was delivered by Pilot, I was concerned after reading negative reviews, but had no problem with our delivery.  Once we had it set up, the picture is absolutely FANTASTIC, we could not be more pleased, I read a review that it was so close to 3D and we do agree!  I would definitely recommend this TV, last TV was a flat panel, also a Samsung, they make a great TV!  Very pleased!!

Reviews.Title: Best 46" non-3D TV available today!
Reviews.Author: A. Acker
Reviews.Content: My Sony Bravia TV died and I needed a replacement. I decided this time I around that I would switch to Samsung from Sony so I deliberated between all the options and model choices available. It basically came down to 3D vs. Non-3D. And we decided since 3D was so much in its infancy to forego it for this generation and save a little money too. Plus, we don't like the idea of wearing those silly glasses either.With regard to this LED, it's 5-stars all-around from ease-of-use to picture quality (my mouth still hangs open) but 1 star for sound quality. I understand that the set is wafer thin and you probably couldn't jam in a big, fat woofer but still could've been better. So, we bought a Samsung HW-C450 Soundbar Speaker and it's now perfect. In addition, built-in streaming apps, like Netflix and Pandora, are just so convenient and have changed our viewing and listening behavior.One note: people have pointed out the "flashlighting" on the bottom corners. You can really only see if it watch in a completely dark room or the screen is completely black. Even then, you really don't even notice unless you look for it. The people who have sent this TV back over this one issue are nuts (IMHO).Oh, and being an iPhone user, there's an app to control the TV available for free to control the unit. I just love it...

Reviews.Title: Great TV makes even bad shows look good
Reviews.Author: J. A. Topps
Reviews.Content: This is one fantastic TV. I had it up and running in no time (save for letting it literally warm up, see note later) and was blown away by the picture, even though we had checked it out in the local stores. The design is beautiful and the stand provides a very solid and stable footing. I was able to attach the stand alone but needed help to lift it to the TV cabinet. The set is packaged well by Samsung and arrived with no issues. Set up was fast and hook up is a breeze. The Samsung Apps are good. The wireless works well, but I have to re-enter my router passkey to get it up and running. I have watched a few movies from Netflix and that process is painless and the movie ran perfectly.  At times the pictures dims during Internet use. I assuming it's due to bandwith, etc. Delivery from Pilot was OK. The delivery guy was great, helping me take the unit out of the box to check for any screen damage. I didn't expect that service. He also made a great suggestion. Because the unit had been sitting in their warehouse for 10 days it was cold. Be sure to wait for the unit to reach room temperature before firing it up. He said he's heard of screens cracking if you don't let it warm up. I appreciated that! I had scheduled my shipping date and window. Because of the snowstorm, they came the next day. But they never called to tell me when they were coming. I finally reached them locally thanks to a national sales rep. She got me their number, which was not in the phone book, and I contacted them. The local rep assured me it was "on the truck" and would come between 11-2. Luckily, I was home for the delivery. Otherwise, who knows? Overall, from ordering, to getting a great, low price, to setup, this TV is a beauty.

Reviews.Title: Install and setup
Reviews.Author: Virginian
Reviews.Content: Install was very easy. Used the Samsung wireless adapter. The system found our Mac network easily and joined the net without a hitch.The unit has excellent picture qualities, simple menu options and remote functions.The black level could be better, but this is not too noticeable in most uses.The internet widgets work easily, but the functionality is far less than I assumed it would be.  Ie: weather is only a simple recap; news is only a screen crawl or list of simple headlines. Apps like HuLu and Vudu work fine. The Yahoo function is extremely limited and of little use.  Hopefully these apps will be enhanced in the future and downloadable to existing customers.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD UN46C6500
Reviews.Author: Denise E. Coyne
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound quality are fabulous.  It was a real pain to set up the internet, but it works well once I got it up and running.  It took several chats with Samsung, Amazon, and Comcast.  The final problem was even tho the Comcast DVR box says it is data enabled, you still need to get the wireless USB device.  Then Samsung had to walk me through the set up.  The setup for Samsung apps requires the use of a on-screen keypad that is very cumbersome.  Once set-up, it works fine.But Netflix works great, DVD's (even old Kurasawa ones and Zatoichi the Blind Samauri) have beautiful quality.  When a movie was cheaply made (Conan the Barbarian) you can really see the flaws!  Great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: HDTV review
Reviews.Author: Lory Simon
Reviews.Content: I found this TV easy to hook up. Right now, I just have it connected to HDTV cable box. Bright, Hi Def. picture. The 46" screen is perfect for the size of our room. We sit about 15 ft. away from the screen.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: bonafidensweet
Reviews.Content: I'm absolutely blown away by my new TV.  I already have a plasma Samsung in the living room but I after giving away my very old (ancient really) box tv that was in the bedroom I decided to research which would be the best tv for me.  Now I wanted a tv that had internet applications so after checking out the Google TV, the LG and the Vizio, I settled on the Samsung 6500 led.  I wanted a tv that had internet capabilities and this tv goes from tv to internet with ease also the clarity is great, even when I'm watching youtube videos.  I wish I would've known prior to buying that I need a lan adapter.  When I read the product description, it had said internet ready and I thought that meant everything was included and internet ready out of the box.  It wasn't a big problem since it's about $52 for a lan adapter at amazon.  I would've bought it together had I known.  I actually didn't get an LG TV because one of the reviews said I would have to purchase something extra for $150 so I could use the internet on the tv and if I'm spending hundreds of dollars already I didn't want to spend and extra hundred so it could do what it's suppose to do in the first place.  The clarity of the Samsung is amazing.  I like the eco friendly options and the upgrades that you can download online for the tv.  The volume is great as well and the TV is so light.  Keep in mind I went without a tv in my bedroom for 5 months because I wanted to make sure I got the right one for me.  I had gone to Best buy and electronic expo, target and even walmart to see the differences between the clarities of the tv's and the Samsung to me is still the best brand for clarity.Even though I had to buy the adapter for my TV, it was well worth it because it wasn't as expensive and I got exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Glorious in every way.
Reviews.Author: C. Perry
Reviews.Content: If you can find a problem with this LED set, you must be severely disappointed with everything else in life.  The picture is ridiculously accurate, with bright whites and deep blacks.  The refresh rate makes a huge difference in smoothing out images, though some movie frame rates look like they are in fast forward.  Otherwise, this set is super thin and uses way less power than older technologies.  So not only do you get much better performance, you get much better efficiency.  That's a win-win situation.  Buy this set.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV except sound quality
Reviews.Author: JerryY
Reviews.Content: This the second Samsung LED HD TV that I have bought in the last year.  If I was in the market for another TV I would most likely buy another Samsung.  The quality of the TV is excellent except for the sound which is less than 3 stars. I use a Bose Wave sound system as an auxilary audio to enhence the quality of the sound.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv!
Reviews.Author: Erin Battaglia
Reviews.Content: I'm not technology savvy, so I had to do a lot of research before investing in a tv. I viewed this tv in stores and was able to compare it amongst other brands; this was the best picture by far! Sports and movies look amazing, I have no complaints. Although, I will add, I only use it to watch tv so I can't comment on the other aspects that the tv has to offer such as gaming, using it with my computer or even the internet (down the road I'll use the internet). I've received lots of compliments on it and am confident that it will last a long time. Would suggest to anyone else in the market for a new tv.

Reviews.Title: Terrific HDTV
Reviews.Author: R. Lee
Reviews.Content: This is our very first HDTV and we could not be happier with this product. My family is very impressed with the quality of the picture and sound. It was pretty easy to set up and use. We have it paired with a Samsung home theater system with wireless rear speakers. We watched the new Robin Hood movie (Blu Ray) the other night and it was like being in the movie theater. This is a first rate product. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Anonymous Rex
Reviews.Content: I bought my TV from Best Buy.  I'm not an expert and this is my first HD TV but the picture is great!  And the sound is just as good as or better than my old TV.  I don't know why everyone comments on the sound being sub par --it sounds great to me.One limitation I found is there is only room for one standard input on the back.  I wanted to hook up an old VCR and a DVD player but there's only room for one of them unless they're HDMI capable (which mine aren't).  Another thing that bothers me is that the screen leans forward just a little.  I don't know if it's a feature or if it's not installed correctly.  But it's hardly noticeable and I wouldn't even have noticed if I hadn't been looking so closely.For you Best Buyers: I was talked into buying a $70 four-foot HDMI cable because it was necessary for a great picture.  Turned out that my cable provider, Bright House Networks, provides one with their Digital Box for free.  Now I have a useless HDMI cable.  And now I see that you can buy the same cable on Amazon for $10!But overall I am very happy with the TV.  I watch more TV than ever!  :)

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal!!
Reviews.Author: BUBBA ARMY
Reviews.Content: Wow!! Now that's a phenomenal picture!!Picture is CRISP! Black is beautifully DEEP! The picture literally looks better than in the store.The only negative is that the sound sucks. It's audible; it just sucks. No TV this thin will have decent audio. External audio source is HIGHLY recommended.Knowledgeable guy at Best Buy told me not to get the 240hz as the human brain can't recognize anything over 120hz, and not to get 3D now as it looks like a cheesy pop-up book and to wait a couple of years for the 3D technology to develop. I looked at Best Buy's 3d demo and I agree.

Reviews.Title: Great overall, but has its issues with backlight bleeding, flashlighting, and clouding.
Reviews.Author: PeeLo Wan
Reviews.Content: The GOOD:Appearance: This TV has a sleek appearance; easily better design than its higher tier counterparts ala C7000 and C8000. The chrome grey is a nice touch. However the bezel design reminds me too much of the Cylon ships from Battlestar Galactica.Picture Quality: I came from an LG 47sl80 which is a regular LCD and I didn't notice a significant jump in picture quality overall. However, all told, the PQ is very good and the colors do pop vividly on this set.Media Player: This is the best feature BY FAR on this set. If you plan on using this to play any of your media files (avi, mp4, wmv, flv, etc.) this set will handle it all. I was very impressed by this capability. Even though I returned this set, this is the one regret I have of returning it.Netflix: This was the only app I used and if you have any familiarity with how netflix works on the ps3, they're nearly identical. Also, the processing speed on this is quite remarkable for a tv set.The BAD:Very horrible backlight bleeding, flashlighting, and clouding. This is the main reason I decided to return it. I've heard of it going away after some time as some owners have reported via avsforum, but it was so bad that I didn't think it was worth resting my hopes on and end up not happening. If it was not for this, I would definitely have  kept this tv.Black Levels: I know this may seem contradictory of me to say since I think the PQ overall is good, but the cnet review was really on point in my opinion with respect to black levels. Indeed, this set only manages to produce relatively light black levels, even lighter than some (cheaper) non-led tvs that I've examined.OVERALL: If you plan on using this set mainly for TV viewing (16:9 programming, with no black bars in other words), as your monitor for your htpc, and/or for gaming (xbox/ps3), then I would strongly recommend this set. However if you're like me and plan on using this to enjoy your netflix and blu-ray library for movie watching (where more than half the time film-source material has the black bars), then you better hope you're one of the few that strikes gold in getting a set that does not have the same uneven backlighting, flashlighting, and clouding issues that mine had.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Erick Sandoval "erf"
Reviews.Content: so far ive been using this tv for about 4 months and i have to say its great. The colors are wonderful and the tv itself looks beautiful. bezel looks great and the stand that resembles a bird claw is really nice. overall looks of TV is A+. Problems of this tv is ghosting which leaves sort of a blurry image when there is fast moving clips this only heppens when you have it set on auto motion (120 HZ) . i contacted samsung and there solution is to just turn off Auto Motion. i feel that is such a stupid way to reselove this problem because i spent more money then i had to on this tv becuase of the 120HZ but i just live with it and still enjoy the way it looks. also there is flashlighting so when the screen is totally black you can see sort of white as if someone was pointing a dim flashlight at the TV but this can only be seen when screen is all black. Flashlighting cant be seen when watching a movie or playing games. i did notice there is a lag when watching movies maybe a second or two lag that happens once in awhile. if you are the type to notice little things or a perfectionist with your electronics you will notice this but if not you wont even be able to see it. overall if this TV would just fix the lag and ghosting it would be five stars instead of four but the colors and brightness of this tv makes up for the imperfections.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mark E. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung products.  This TV is great.  Nice features, Internet capable, it's all very good.  No complaints here at all.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Bad Long Term Support - No Amazon Instant Video
Reviews.Author: dave_a
Reviews.Content: This TV has an excellent picture, and I/O options.  It doesn't have that silly fanout cable Samsung put into later models for the component/composite inputs.  On that note, you should probably upgrade your stuff to HDMI-capable devices anyway.  Just sayin...I am most disappointed by Samsung's planned obsolescence of their products where you no longer receive firmware updates/upgrades on the device after a couple of years.  One example is that, despite the description, this particular model, released in 2010, does *not* support Amazon Instant Video, and I can call but guarantee that neither Samsung, nor Amazon are writing one.  So, you'll need to do one of two things for Amazon Instant Video: buy an external device that supports it (e.g. a modern "Smart" Blu-ray player, or a streaming device like a Roku), or simply buy a newer TV.

Reviews.Title: Loved the TV
Reviews.Author: Nagesh Shrinath
Reviews.Content: Its been over 3 years now and I still love it. Although I would recommend customers to buy a new latest model. This model does have lot of Apps for internet, but it doesnt have the browser. So you cant browse sites. The new samsung TVs have a built in browser which is certainly much more useful. In any case, I still like this TV.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price!
Reviews.Author: Chief purchasing officer
Reviews.Content: You can't get a better LED tv for this kind of money. Internet ready, 1080p, 120mz, & a divexDecoder. A big plus! Not worth five stares only for the lack of wall mount, & optical cable.Over all it's a great buy. Added a Samsung sound bar and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture
Reviews.Author: Fire Chick
Reviews.Content: I was researching TV's for about 6 months.  I finally decided on my Samsung 46C6500.  Wow, I couldn't have made a better choice!  This TV is soooooo clear it's amazing.  I purchased it for my basement entertainment area and it's perfect.  With my surround sound speakers it's like being at the movies.  In my opinion, Samsung makes the BEST TV's.After I purchased it through Amazon, and it showed up at my home in TWO days! I continued to check the price online; 12 days after my purchase it had dropped another $100.00.  I contacted Amazon and they said they would credit me for the $100.00, no problem.....quick and easy.Better customer service than I've seen in years!I didn't have to worry about how I would get a 46" tv home, and the price was better than I could find at any store within a 20 mile radius of my home.Thanks Amazon!  You ROCK!!  :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung 46" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Aloha John
Reviews.Content: We did a considerable amount of research (and viewing)before purchasing this TV. I was particularly impressed by user comments regarding the "easy to set up" nature of this model. However, I was still skeptical as we have satellite TV and I was certain there would be some gremlins.Much to my delight, it was a true plug & play process. The HDMI cables provided an easy hookup and we have been enjoying the BEST and clearest images we have ever seen.This TV is amazing and well worth the price!!Probably will not use the wireless feature, but definitely like the PC input, iPhone and overall sleek design. Some users have noted that the sound quality requires a sound bar/ home theater addition, but we have been very pleased with the sound.I would definitely recommend this TV to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Love my TV!
Reviews.Author: Allie
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a couple of months now and I absolutely LOVE it.  The picture is amazing and I have no problems when I am watching HD channels.  Sometimes on a couple of channels that are not HD, I do have some lines at the very top of the screen but not in the picture.  It's always on the same 2 channels so I'm not so sure it's the TV and not the cable.  The sound is great when watching TV but we also purchased the recommended blu ray player and need to double the volume when watching a DVD-also not a problem with the TV.  Playing with all of the settings was a little much, I think it's almost too customizable. We stuck with the defaults on most things.  A couple of issues we have had are: there is only one set of plugs on the back for a component meaning our Wii.  We had to get a blu ray immediately because it uses an HDMI cable, which our DVD player doesn't.  It has plenty of HDMI inputs though.  I also got the recommended Linkstik wireless LAN adapter and I have fantastic wifi in the house but the internet TV sometimes freezes after little use when scrolling between apps and the whole system needs to be shut down, I don't have a problem streaming movies though.  Amazon beat the price of the big box electronic stores by several hundred dollars and squaretrade also beat the price on the warranty by a couple hundred.  I was able to schedule delivery it worked out well.  I would buy this tv again and again.  The picture quality is above and beyond any I have seen, and I've seen a lot! I shopped for months for the perfect TV and I pretty much found it with this one.

Reviews.Title: EXTRAORDINARY VIEWING
Reviews.Author: BARGAINMOMMA*
Reviews.Content: AFTER PURCHASING THIS LED HDTV THROUGH AMAZON WE GAVE OUR OLD SET TO A NURSING HOME AND WE'LL NEVER GO BACK TO CONVENTIONAL TELEVISION. I CANNOT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT THE CLARITY OF THE PICTURE ON THIS SCREEN--THE CLASSY STYLE AND SUPER THIN SCREEN MAKE IT A WORK OF ART WHEN HUNG ON A WALL AS WE DID AFTER WE PURCHASED A GREAT WAL MOUNT THROUGH AMAZON ALSO. SAMSUNG IS A GREAT PRODUCT AND HIGHLY RATED IN ELECTRONIC REVIEWS AND THIS TELEVISION DID NOT DISAPPOINT. MY HUSBAND AND I ARE ENJOYING WATCHING RERUNS NOW BECAUSE THEY LOOK AMAZINGLY DIFFERENT WITH THIS TECHNOLOGY!

Reviews.Title: fantastic image!
Reviews.Author: fast teddy
Reviews.Content: Second screen for the home. Easy to set-up. Chose to connect via hdmi through a Denon AVR receiver. Phenomenal image quality. Good viewing from off-center. Slim and lightweight. Now have 3 Samsungs throughout the house, all are brilliant. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Best LED TV
Reviews.Author: john.h.a
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this LED tv, and all my family is more than happy whith the queality of this TV the posibility to access pandora, facebook, youtube make it perfect for us. I am just looking foward to get a good receciver to improve the audio quality wich by the way is not that bad.

Reviews.Title: Solid LED TV
Reviews.Author: FFXIII Legend
Reviews.Content: I'm very satisfied with this TV. It's hooked up to my DirecTV 1080i and my Blu-ray Player. It's crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Great tv - would recommend
Reviews.Author: LC
Reviews.Content: TV is great, very slim and looks good even when its off. Picture quality is also great - has a bunch of functionality (i.e. internet) that I dont use because I find it is easier to use my Blueray for Netflix streaming, Pandora, etc.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with this TV
Reviews.Author: Bearcard
Reviews.Content: Although I have only had this for one month, I am very happy with this TV.  It was delivered promptly after my order and it was a scheduled delivery for both date and time.We have this mounted in our bedroom and have enjoyed the picture and sound.  I have also used this to display the applications furnished by Samsung for Facebook, weather etc, and plan on adding more.It is a wonderful experience and I recommend this to anyone wanting a larger TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Schiavone "Atombuster"
Reviews.Content: Picture is excellent.  I was concerned with the side lit vs back lit, but I can't tell the difference.  Amazingly thin.  Only 40 lbs, easy to carry by my self.  Like the big buttons on the remote.The various internet apps can be confusing because the Yahoo apps are on a different display from the samsung apps.  But after playing with it I learned how to get the app I wanted.  Not sure how useful apps on a TV will be but time will tell.  It was a feature I wanted and was a selling feature.Disappointed that you have to buy a wireless adaptor.  Mine is hardwired so it doesn't affect me.  It would make it more convenient.  I noticed the new models come with wireless internet built in.Note that when viewing movies over the apps like netflix and the TV is connected to a home theater system, you won't get true suround sound.  Sound from the apps is limited to 2.1 per the manual.The descriptions all say there are 2 speakers.  As far as I can tell there is just 1 located behind the TV.  I have no complaints on the sound, after all you can't expect much from TV speakers, that's what home theater systems are for.After 4 weeks I'm a happy customer.  Great value for the price.  I got this for $1168 as it was being discontinued.

Reviews.Title: great video, ok sound
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Thelen
Reviews.Content: I think this is a very good tv,great picture, the sound could be a bit better but with a small thickness monitor how much can you do?

Reviews.Title: What a picture
Reviews.Author: Fredstench
Reviews.Content: This tv has a gorgeous picture. very clear, crisp and with amazing color. The only downside is the sound quality. Its just OK but I knew that going in so I am not disappointed.I  also really like the clean design of this tv. It has a classy look to it.It took me a while to get the TV to recognize my wireless router. I had to call in the reinforcements (my son in law) after getting the run around between Samsung, Comcast and Linksys.

Reviews.Title: I never thought I would love Amazon anymore than I did
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Same TV as from Best Buy, saved $500, the TV is perfect, delivery was pretty good, had to be home from a certain time to a certain time.  But anyway, this TV is great, and Amazon saved me money, and made the wife happy too.  The picture quality is tops.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, love samsung apps
Reviews.Author: SPR
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, worth every penny. Samsung Apps are great (lot of apps, some free, some for purchase).Picture quality is excellent.If you need theater effect,you may want to attach external speakers. Remote control application is easy to handle.Overall, I am fully satisfied and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Definitely Pleased
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: We just purchased this TV and are incredibly pleased with the screen image. It's a great crisp, clear picture. We got it from Fred Meyer for $840. Definitely a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Matthew B. Astemborski "PsychoBlaze"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent television. My father owns one of last years LCD model which looks amazing, but this LED seem to have an edge. The image quality is fantastic, while the sound is only OK. The blacks are really dark and black and the whites are truely white. The colors are so vivid its scary. Due to the mediocre sounds from the very thin TV, I ended up buying a sound bar for the tiny room I have it in, which sounds amazing. My favorite features are the built in internet with netflix. You can also download a Samsung file sharing program to your PC and share video, music and pictures over your home network. It works like a charm.Amazon used CEVA to deliver the TV. I read many bad things about CEVA, but the TV showed up on time. I scheduled a 2-5pm delivery window through Amazon when I ordered. When the tracking showed the TV being delivered to my local area I called CEVA to verify the appointment. They originally were going to deliver the TV 7am-11am, which would have not worked for me, so I'm glad I called to check. I live in a cold area, so didn't let the delivery guy test the tv, which was ice cold. I let it warm up for aobut 2 hours before testing it.Very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: mmmmmmm
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV installed now for 5 months. Everything connected together with the receiver, speakers, cable box, and dvd player. It is worth going with the 6500 version versus the 6300 version since this one has the Samsung Smart Apps - main one I use is Netflix. There are plenty available for everyone.The absolute best ability of this tv is the network capability - it works flawlessly connecting to my network. My main use here is to view home videos and pictures. Viewing quality if great.The availability to access my network music collection does not work well. This tv appears to only like mp3 format. I have my music mainly in WMA lossless format - it doesn't like this. No matter, the speaker quality for music is only good.For music listening, I stick with the network receiver (Yamaha NEO HD).One final item that I need to determine is how to take the speaker output from the tv and connect into the receiver. As mentioned above, the speaker quality is only good. When viewing Netflix movies, output is through the tv.Overall, this is a very good tv.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Darn Good TV
Reviews.Author: Frank "Frank"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV to replace a 4 year old 40" LCD that we wanted to move upstairs.  Overall, we have been pleased with the TV's performance.  Picture quality is excellent, though we did need to adjust the factory settings to get to a color spectrum that was more to our liking.  We also immediately turned off the 120Hz feature as this is not so much of a feature as it is an annoying distraction.  Some have complained about the edge lit nature of the screen, but generally we have not seen any light bleed in dark scenes.  That said, depending upon the signal source, we have seen some very very minor sharpness issues in certain dark scenes.  Again, this seems to be source dependent (Think House on Bravo (minor issues) vs. House on Fox (no issues)) as it is not a consistent flaw across all channels or sources.The internet connectivity of this TV is also a nice touch.  We've gotten movies from Amazon's VOD service though finding Amazon's movies through Yahoo was a bit cumbersome (Note to Amazon - get your own app on the TV).  We've also used the VUDU movie service, which due to its accessibility and selection is pretty cool.  We did did not get the Samsung proprietary wireless device as we had an Apple Airport Express already around.  We have not had any issues with streaming, even using an 802.11b signal.The one issue with this TV is the sound quality.  It's "good enough" for casual TV watching, but has sort of a small/hollow/tinny sound that could be better.  This is mostly due to the size of the TV cabinet which simply can't house big enough speakers.  For sports/movies, run the sound through your home theater, or alternatively, buy a sound bar.  If you are on the fence because of the sound issue, don't be.  It is really a minor complaint in what is ultimately a great TV.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I am very impressed with this TV
Reviews.Author: Sir Archer
Reviews.Content: I got this tv a last week, and have absolutely no issues with it.  I love it.  I've watching HD videos on it, and HD tv shows on it.  I watched the superbowl on it, and was just totally blown away.  It's not 3D, and the screen still showed enough definition, that it looked like 3D.  I'd recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46C6500
Reviews.Author: D. Charest
Reviews.Content: TV has a bright clear picture, black level very good. Only a little over an inch thick, hangs on the wall as easily as a picture frame. I didn't like the four legged stand very much so I purchased a wall mounting kit. Audio quality is OK but would be better with an external speaker system.

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, Cool iPhone App, but has huge flash lighting issues!
Reviews.Author: Curts
Reviews.Content: I received this tv a few weeks ago and have been putting it through it's paces, here is what I have found.Image qualityDurting the day and with a decent amount of ambient light the image looks good, however at night with no lights on I can see tons of brighter areas on the screen. From what I have found this is known as flashlighting. The corners are really noticeable and various parts of the screen. It has become very distracting specifically when there are any movements in the screen. I would really like to exchange this to see if it's a set specific problem, but I have seen many of the same reviews all over the place.Build qualityThis set is very sleek, light weight and extremely slim. The stand is a weird design, I would prefer a standard flat stand, but will be mounting it to the wall soon if I can resolve the above issues.Internet appsThese are really cool and work surprisingly well. Streaming hulu and netflix is great. Along with the samsung remote app on the iPhone it makes easy to use. Biggest problem is that the screen setting do not transfer when you switch into the Internet side of the tv, so everything looks weird. Seems like auto motion plus turns back on. I spoke with samsung tech support and they insist that it does not, but I do not agree, I can see it.***UPDATE - I have found the image control menu in the Internet side of the tv and have disabled auto motion plus so everything looks normal. While watching a video press TOOLS on the remote and a menu comes up where you can adjust picture and sound settings.iPhone appSamsung has an iPhone app that let's you control your tv  as long as you are on the same network. This is by far one of the coolest aspects of the tv, no more trying to see the remote in the dark, just use your iPhone or iPod touch. Most apps allow you to use the keyboard so you don't have to figure out which numbers correspond to which numbers on your remote control. It responds extremely well and fast.SummaryI really like the look and functionality of this tv, however the image quality leaves something to be desired. The flashlight problem is a real problem, I can't watch this tv in the dark because of it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: S. Abdool "sashi"
Reviews.Content: I went with this samsung because they have the best customer service!I've progressed over the years from their dlp-LCD now the ledThey truly have an amazing product the ease of set up and installation is greatAs well as connecting to the Internet with the link stick.The colours are beautiful and the best part is the auto dimming when u turn offThe lights. I paired this tv with the samsung blu ray and again easy setup andBrilliant image and audio quality.A great buy!

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best right now!
Reviews.Author: S Berry
Reviews.Content: Very sexy TV!  Quality is great, everything about this TV is great, Audio could be better, will need to buy soundbar.  Highly recommend Samsung right now!

Reviews.Title: GREAT HD TV, GREAT PRICE.
Reviews.Author: ELLIE
Reviews.Content: I got the tv a couple of weeks ago and after doing alot research and trying to pick between samsung, sony or LG, i decided to go with the samsung since my previous tv set was samsung. I am glad I chose the samsung the tv is very slim, light and the picture quality amazing that's all I can say. my bluray dvds look amazing and when I play videos from my hard drive the picture is great, I have never seen such a beautiful picture quality, even when i watch regular programing from my cable tv it looks great. If you are thinking about purchasing a LED TV look no further is the one you want and for the price I got it is a Steal. I paid less than 1400 here in amazon. I highly recommend this TV set.

Reviews.Title: P.I.P. useless, but otherwise great.
Reviews.Author: ddb
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a month ago to replace a big 15 years old Sony. The old Sony had P.I.P (picture in picture) which means you can watch two different stations at the same time and switch picture or sound between the two with two buttons on the remote. Well, the final selling feature on this Samsung was the P.I.P. and when I discovered the extreme limitations of this sets P.I.P. to say the least I was very upset. You can not view two stations at once, with only the T.V., you have to have two built-in turners.  P.I.P. is very limited (menu options only).  Useful P.I.P. may be a thing of the pasted.

Reviews.Title: Received a Lemon!
Reviews.Author: WordofTeekz
Reviews.Content: I received a Lemon Samsung UN46C65000 46" LED TV!I was soo upset, it died on me after 10 days of using it!I called Samsung and had them dispatch someone to come fix it (which took another 2 weeks)After that, the kind service tech came in and said we had a dead power supply and was surprised that it was only 10 days upon receiving the television.He changed the power supply, and the TV worked, but now the image display was all messed up and burnt out.Luckily, he had a 46" display in his car and he switched the display, basically giving me another brand new television.What an inconvenience, the tech even advised me to never purchase a television form Amazon ever again.  I'm definitely NOT going to do so.

Reviews.Title: 10/5 stars: Astounding Picture Quality! , 5/7 stars for details
Reviews.Author: GarageBoy
Reviews.Content: The picture quality's so good its unnerving to watch at first. Friends who have other flat screens think we're playing a Blu-Ray disc when it's tuned in to standard cable, not even on an HD station. The HD quality's almost like watching 3D, too. It was very easy to set up and connect to the internet using the USB wifi receiver (free with purchase + free blu-ray player!). Hooking up my trusty old Logitech 5.1 was easy via optical input. 5/7 based on: Except for Netflix, the apps are pretty useless, but Amazon had a good deal on the app model. The Blu-ray (Samsung)-TV interface isn't as facile as that for our now deceased Sony Trinitron + DVD Player. And the remotes for each don't work 100% interchangeably.The biggest con so far is having to enter info. with a telephone style keypad! But Samsung's iPhone remote app works great. The most important thing, though, is the incredible picture, plus Amazon was running a nice sale, best price on land or in the cloud. Don't wait, get one today!

Reviews.Title: Overall Good. Some Quarks.
Reviews.Author: James Ward
Reviews.Content: Good: Overall this is a good TV.  I'm not an expert on black levels, etc.  But once we figured out how to overcome the "Soap Opera Effect" (hint: turn off auto motion plus in the picture options) then sitcoms and movies looked great!  We also bought a Samsung Soundbar (HW-C450) and now the sound is also great.Bad: We just have a regular antenna and the built-in converter is very bad.  Often it says it has no signal when we get signal on the same antenna via a very cheap converter box.Bad: We don't use the apps much since there isn't much there yet.  The Yahoo! Widget is nice because it provides access to the Amazon digital download service but it is strange that it's a widget and not an app.  Seems like Amazon should be an app.

Reviews.Title: Brilliantly built tv with stunning picture quality
Reviews.Author: KWL "KL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv (bundled with the blu ray player and wireless dongle) in 2010, and have had ~1 year using it now.  I've grown up with mainly using only Sony TVs.Pros:The Samsung UN46C6500 46-Inch 120 Hz 1080p LED HDTV (Black) is absolutely stunning to look at.  The picture quality is amazing displaying any type of content.  The build of the machine is very solid as well, and being roughly an inch thick, it is one sexy sleek machine.Cons:Coming from an entire life of viewing Sony TVs, i've expected to see similar features that were lacking on this Samsung TV.  The remote control feels cheaper (lighter and more plastic'y) than any of my prior Sony remote controls.  However, the remote control is clear and intuitive to use. The Samsung UN46C6500 also doesnt have an ability (like the Sony TVs) that allow you to split the screen on two different inputs side by side.  It does have the ability to split the screen (picture in picture) between the tv coax and one other input only.  One last shortfall is the limited number of inputs available.  an extra few would have been great!All in all, its a wonderful TV thats built to turn any media you put on it to shine!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture quality
Reviews.Author: RV
Reviews.Content: First time LED/LCD owner - so,blown away by picture quality.TV seems good,except the stand,which is not stylish.Guess because of thinness of TV,such a stand was devised.Blu-ray,DVDs appear great.Didnt like Movie mode much - so keep mine in Natural mode mostly - dynamic is also good.Sound is also pretty good.Didn't try all internet options yet - you tube picture quality is not good,probably because of 46" size - not sure. Didn't try Netflix etc yet.Standard definition plays good too.So,overall happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Image with Lousy Internet
Reviews.Author: Gary Knapp
Reviews.Content: Do buy this TV if you want a brilliant image but don't buy it if you want to use it to connect to the internet.  My main use for the internet is for Netflix; the problem with Netflix is that the number of movies available on line for "instant viewing" is very limited and then most of the time I get "This movie is currently not available for instant viewing - try again later" or "Can't connect to the internet".  So I have given up on watching Netflix through the TV.  CinemaNow? -- forget it; won't download with error code 512.  CinemaNow tech support through Roxio is totally useless.  Samsung apps? -- forget it; I've never gotten them to even allow me to log in.  From other reviews they apparently suck anyway so don't waste your time on them. I've hooked up a computer and now do any online stuff through it which is OK. The whole internet connection thing is a joke.  Given the problems with internet connectivity (even with a hardwired ethernet connection) I would seriously consider another brand.

Reviews.Title: Best  TV watching ever!!
Reviews.Author: aphotog3
Reviews.Content: Easy out of the box;  great HD TV watching;  never enough HD channels; Great TV hdwe design too.

Reviews.Title: If you want Art buy one hang it on your wall. if you want tv don't bother!
Reviews.Author: Mike Ritchey
Reviews.Content: Five weeks into enjoying my new TV mounted on my bedroom wall the sound becomes muffled. Reset it to factory setting still muffled.  Samsung online service wants serial number where might that be not on the receipt but on the TV in the back mounted to the wall.Good thing I kept the 9' box so I can get at it, without having the installers come back out to get the number.Samsung service will come out and inspect it... for what it doesn't work!  Good luck to all of you who dare to purchase this TV PS keep the box.This TV isn't worth it, get another from a better manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: great tv not so hot service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Chris 101
Reviews.Content: Television is excellent so far.  The only negative about the experience was the "illusion" when purchasing it that the delivery would be as scheduled.  The carrier that brought it to the door did not receive it until the 2nd day after it was supposed to arrive at my house.  I understand logistics and would have preferred setting up a delivery appointment by the carrier rather than take a day off work when Amazon said it would arrive.

Reviews.Title: Beware the Amazon.com TV Low Price Guarantee
Reviews.Author: SMF "here, kitty, kitty"
Reviews.Content: I apologize for posting this on a product page but I think more people should be aware of this issue.I am very disappointed in the deceitful manner amazon.com purports to offer a "TV Low Price Guarantee."On the product page amazon.com states:"TV Low Price GuaranteeWe are working hard to make sure that our prices are the best around, but if you find another site that offers a lower price within 14 days after the date we ship your order, let us know and we will credit your original payment method for the difference. If we lower the price on our own website within 14 days after we ship your order, let us know and we will refund you the difference as well."But then amazon.com has a number of exceptions, which can only be viewed by navigating to several different pages, that make it possible to easily circumvent fulfilling this seemingly straightforward offer.I found a website that offered a lower price for the television I had purchased from amazon.com within a few days of my purchase, and amazon.com's customer "service" representatives twisted the loosely phrased "Terms and Conditions" of the low price guarantee to insure that this lower price would be ineligible.I find this kind of duplicitous selling practice to be reprehensible. I was left with no choice but to cancel my order. I have been a loyal amazon.com customer for about a decade and I have never been so disappointed with amazon.com service as I am in this instance.What amazon.com offers is a low price guarantee "with restrictions." At the very least, this should be noted in the information on the product page, so the customer will be prompted to investigate these restrictions. At the moment, the customer will most likely never discover these restrictions until they make a purchase and find a lower price elsewhere.In the future, I will have to seriously consider whether I am comfortable making purchases from amazon.com, when they have policies that are so misleading.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN46C6500 46-Inch 120 Hz 1080p LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Chandu
Reviews.Content: 1) For the a price of $1389 along with Samsung HT-C5500 Blu-ray Home Theater System and Samsung WIS09ABGN LinkStick Wireless LAN Adapter, i felt its a good deal.2) One major issue what i felt most inconvenient, is the remote. if remote would have got a touch screen it would have been better while using internet applications.3) no screws were included for a wall mount fix. you have to buy them seperately.look into the manual for the screw size.4) The picture quality of was too good. i even read thru problems of led tv's, esp samsung in some of the forums. i could not able to find the same atleast in the tv what i bought. (its been only 3 days since i recd tv)5) streaming of the netflix movies, youtube etc.... was good (on cable vision internet).Overall i feel that its a very good deal what i got. and i give a 5 rating.

Reviews.Title: no prices online due to MAP
Reviews.Author: David L. Fry
Reviews.Content: I do not put items in my cart at the store, why would I want to do it online!Show the prices, going back to the store or other online stores to shop, MAP has ruined amazon.com
